resources.string: Network connection is unstable, do you want to retry or use the application in off-line mode?
Delete mode - tap item to delete
My Magazines - tap to view or download

"and would like to share it with you!
The original article is included as an attachment to this message.
For more publications go digital at www.zinio.com"
"Please send me special offers from Zinio's trusted partners."
Please email me about special offers from Zinio.
Turn tips off. They can be managed via the More settings.
No articles on the current page.
This screen requires Internet access. Please check your connectivity or aeroplane mode setting.
Password should contain between 5 and 20 characters.
Encountered an issue with the server. Please try again momentarily.
"This will delete all Zinio library data and will not be recoverable. You'll need to download your publications again."

"You don't have connectivity and cannot download any publications.
You can download your publications when connectivity is restored."
Old and new passwords must be different.

"Connection required to download publications.
You can still read what is currently available in your library and download publications when connectivity is restored."

"Your username or password were incorrect.
Please try again."
This account has reached its maximum number of authorised devices. Please de-authorise a device and try again.
Email address already exists. Please select a different one.
The first name should not be more than 80 characters.
Please enter a valid email address.
The last name should not be more than 80 characters.
An error has occurred. Please try again.
No logged in user to sign out.
There is a newer version of the Zinio Reader available. This version is no longer supported. Please upgrade to the latest Zinio Reader.

"You've indicated that you want to delete all publications from your library.
Don't worry, you won't permanently lose anything.
Deleting just removes it from your device. You'll be able to download the publication again if needed."
This device does not have enough disk space to download the selected publication. Please free up at least %d MB and try again.
SD Card has been removed. Zinio application is going to quit. Please insert an SD Card and start the application again.
Connection required to access the store. Please check your connectivity or aeroplane mode setting.

"Are you sure you want to sign out?
You'll be asked to sign in again to access Zinio application."

"Zinio's rich content is best read on devices using at least a 800x480 screen.
You can continue using the application but please be aware that the experience may not be optimal."
Some publications do not have text articles. The Table of Contents or the Visual Index can be used to find the page you are looking for.
"Single tap to see toolbar menu. You can choose a visual or text-based Table of Contents."

"Tips to get you started:
* Turn the page by swiping right or left * Double tap on the screen to zoom * Select the 'text' button, visible on the first page of an article, to read."

"3G network connection detected.
Publications may still be downloaded over 3G, but for optimal experience Wi-fi is recommended."
The device does not meet the minimum memory requirement for the current version of Zinio Reader.
Are you sure you want to delete %s?
Internet connection is required to download publications. Please turn on Internet connection and try again.
This version of the application is no longer supported. Please upgrade to the latest version of the Zinio app.
Email and password do not match our records, please try again.

This device has not been properly authorized for use with your Zinio account. To reauthorize your device, please sign out of the app and then sign back in. If you continue to have trouble, please contact Zinio Customer Support.
Email address is invalid. Please enter a valid email address.
The password is invalid, please select another one
Invalid issue. Please contact customer service at support@zinio.com.
This account has reached its maximum number of authorized devices. Please de-authorize a device and try again.
Packing list missing. Please contact customer service at support@zinio.com.
The email address already exists, please select a different one.
A server error has occurred. Please try again later.
Parts of the app may be unavailable right now. If you can’t access something, try again later.
Invalid newsstand. Please contact customer service at support@zinio.com.
You currently have no titles. Available titles can be found on the Shop tab.
User not entitled. Please contact customer service at support@zinio.com.
Your feedback is important to us ,please provide your comments now.
The out-of-date issue is removed and will be downloaded again.
Zinio server not available, please try again later.
The Zinio Newsstand will return shortly. We apologize for any inconvenience.
Your feedback is important to us, please provide your comments now.
